officialTitle: RELAXaHEAD for Headache Patients (Phase II): RELAXaHEAD for Migraine and Sleep

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.measure: Number of Patients Enrolled in the Study

primary.description:
5-item self-assessment measuring satisfaction with the daily dairy function of the RELAXaHEAD app. Items are ranked on a 5-point Likert scale, where: 0 = Strongly Disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 3 = Agree; and 4 = Strongly Agree.

The total score is the sum of responses. Scores range from 0-20; higher scores indicate higher levels of satisfaction.

The total score is the sum of responses. Scores range from 0-20; higher scores indicate higher levels of satisfaction.

primary.measure: Progressive Muscle Relaxation Therapy (PMR) Satisfaction Scores Among RELAX Arm Participants
primary.description:
4-item self-assessment measuring satisfaction with PMR administered via the RELAXaHEAD app. Items are ranked on a 5-point Likert scale, where: 0 = Strongly Disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 3 = Agree; and 4 = Strongly Agree.

The total score is the sum of responses. Scores range from 0-16; higher scores indicate higher levels of satisfaction

primary.measure: Number of Days RELAX Arm Participants Performed Progressive Muscle Relaxation Therapy (PMR) at Least 5 Minutes/Day
primary.description: Calculated using the backend analytics in the RELAXaHEAD app. Measure of feasibility.

primary.measure: Number of Days Participants Used Diary
primary.description: Calculated using the backend analytics in the RELAXaHEAD app. Measure of feasibility.
